description: Ralph Peake MHK says Manx politicians are taking concerns "seriously" as campaigners renew a call for action.
title: Climate change debate 'most important in decades', says MHK
title_page: Climate change debate 'most important in decades', says MHK - BBC News
maintext: Tynwald had "a responsibility to really look at it and really want to change", and had the opportunity to "show some real leadership" in tackling climate change, he added.
